## SolidLineMaterialParameters.dashes property

Describes line dash type (`"Round"`<!-- -->, `"Square"`<!-- -->, `"Diamond"`<!-- -->). Default is `"Square"`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dashes?: LineDashes;
```
